Package sorter

Interface InPlaceSortableList<E extends Comparable<E>>

public interface InPlaceSortableList<E extends Comparable<E>>
Interface for generic lists that allows to sort in place by using just the two basic operations compare and swap. This interface offers further operations for other sorting approaches.
Version:
2023
Author:
Axel Schmolitzky

      Checks whether the given position is a valid position in this list.
      Parameters:
      position - the position under test
      Returns:
      true if (position >= 0) && (position < gibLaenge())
